description: A request for Order status information.
title: orderStatusRequest

___sellerId.description: The ID of the Partner/Access Provider (Seller) organization receiving the order.

___buyerId.description: The ID of the Service Provider (Buyer) organization placing the order.

___orderId.description: Unique identifier for the order for which status information is being requested (if known, otherwise the buyerPurchaseOrderNumber is reauired).

___objectType.description: The type of the object, orderStatusRequest.

___buyerPurchaseOrderNumber.description: A number that uniquely identifies a order within the buyer's enterprise.
